context: Could you remind me when Being John Malkovich was released?
It was released in 1999, good movie!
I loved everything about it. Maybe it was a good year for movies. Anything else good was released in 1999?
Wild Wild West was also released in 1999
Of course! WWW really good western. Was Will Smith in it?
It sure does! He's a great actor.
Well, I like some of his roles more than others. Maybe I should watch a movie with him tonight. Any suggestions?
The Pursuit of Happyness is one of my favorite movies, and he produced the Secret Life of Bees which is another really great one!
Yes, it's true. But I feel more like science fiction. maybe I should watch I, Robot or anything else you suggest.
resp: Stargate Universe is a great sci fi movie, and so is Infinite Jest!
